official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the United States House of Representatives and Senate should pass health care reform initiatives which have received overwhelming bipartisan support, prior to the adjournment of the 103d Congress.

summary.text: Urges the leadership of the House of Representatives and the Senate to work together in a bipartisan manner to pass health care reform initiatives in the 103d Congress.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the United States House of Representatives and Senate should pass health care reform initiatives which have received overwhelming bipartisan support, prior to the adjournment of the 103d Congress.
